body.name: Computer Gaming Chair,Ergonomic Office PC Desk Chair, High Back PU Leather Executive Chair with Lumbar Support and Flip-up Armrests, Height Adjustable Swivel Rolling Chair,Blue
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 2 hrs 46 mins
features: 【Ergonomic Gaming Chair】Disregarding the traditional lumbar pillow design, the ergonomic curved design is directly applied to the gaming chair. The streamlined U-shaped back with the seat's adjustable angle function can fit the spine and lumbar area better than a regular lumbar pillow design, providing great comfort and relaxation ,while helping you maintain the correct sitting posture.

【Flip-up Arms and Adjustable Backrest】The padded armrests feel soft but supportive, providing the ultimate forearm and elbow comfort.The flip-up armrests also make it easier to push the leather office chair completely under the desk to maximize space.With a simple twist of the knob under the seat, the backrest of the desk chair swivels from 90° to 120°, bringing you great comfort. The stylish desk chair is an ideal choice for playing, working, studying, drawing, relaxing and watching TV.

【Ultra Comfortable Cunshion】The game chair is filled with high density memory foam, the cushion is thick and slightly concave to fit the curve of the hip, while the two-color combination design can meet the needs of creating visual and environmental atmosphere. The seat and backrest of the chair are made of upgraded PU leather, easy to clean, wear-resistant and waterproof. No tearing, no peeling, no flaking, no breakage.

【Sturdy Construction】Gaming chair built with premium materials and meticulous craftsmanship, the sturdy heavy duty base and smooth rolling casters create a super stable structure and can support up to 275 lbs. The high-back computer chair features 360° smooth-rolling casters for freedom of movement and comfort when rolling in any direction. Nylon casters allow for smooth movement on a variety of surfaces without noise or scratches.

【Easy Assembly and Perfect Gift】 Our gaming chair comes with all hardware and necessary tools and can be assembled in just 15 minutes. The stylish look of this PC gaming chair will add a touch of glamor to the interior of any room. It is the perfect gift for your family or friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my teenage son and it is great! It is pretty comfortable and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is great. I have not had a gaming chair in a while since I had to get rid of my old one when I was moving.I love the red and black of this chair and I like that it has bucket seats. It is so comfy.It came with everything that I needed to put this chair together. Everything was nicely packed and labeled so that you would know exactly what screw to use in what area of the chair. It only took me about 30 minutes to assemble and it is very comfy and the wheels are sooooo smooth!!!I like that fact that the armrests move up and down. For me, this makes it easier for me to get in and out of the chair.I am sitting in the chair as I type this and I can tell you that it is very comfy.It is not the most expensive chair nor the most comfortable chair out there BUT for the price, it is great. I love it and I am looking forward to sitting in this chair the next time I play my games. =)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget gaming chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair definitely has the classic gaming chair look. It's a bit smaller than I would prefer, but I'm not a small guy, so for a more average sized person, I'd think this would be perfectly fine. This has a solid sturdy feel and the rollers have been good, not locking up.

reviews.reviewerName: Modern Sci Fi ReviewsModern Sci Fi Reviews
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice chair and well thought out and designed product
reviews.reviewText: This is a really interesting chair that really delivers and was much better than I was expecting. The prospect of getting a chair via mail is a bit daunting but this package delivers completely. The real surprise to me here is just how good the instructions and tools are for putting this together. It comes in a nicely packed box and the parts are easy to prepare. It actually comes with the T Driver which I have never seen in any furniture before but which makes assembly go faster and easier. In general it has:- Nice pleather like material and very comfortable to sit in- Great rolling and easy up and down function- Arm rests slide up when neededIts a firm seat which is nice and doesn't get hot. It doesn't have a ton of adjustments although there is a dial underneath the seat to control back and forth motion. Overall its a great chair and I am very pleased with it. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent value gaming chair
reviews.reviewText: Let's get something out of the way at the very beginning here: this is NOT a high-end gaming chair. That being said, at it's current price, it is a very decent value gaming chair. Each individual piece game wrapped quite well so as to not shift around in the box or cause damage to other pieces within the box. The base with the legs is actually a decent quality metal frame, which I did not expect at this price point, and which I was pleasantly surprised by. The leather is PLU leather, so don't expect top grain performance here. The seat of the chair is actually less contoured than I would have liked and is a little less comfortable because of it. This would work well for short sessions in the chair, but I would not like to sit in it all day long -- it's just not comfortable enough. The arms fold back and the seat raises and tilts, though the tilting action needs to be adjusted underneath the seat instead of on the side, but that's usually reserved for higher-end chairs anyway. I'm just happy that it has the ability to tilt. It rolls smoothly and has a decent quality feel to it overall. Putting it together took a little bit of time and wasn't too bad, but putting the back of the chair on was a little tough. Make sure you follow the instructions exactly and when it says to only put the screws in 50% of the way, there's a reason for it, and you will tighten them up later once the back of the chair is in place. Overall, I would say I wouldn't use this for my daily driver for working 8+ hours each day, but for short sessions in front of a screen, it's pretty decent for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Gaming Chair.
reviews.reviewText: This is very comfortable gaming chair. I like the color red and black. The leather feels very smooth. There is no smell at all. The assembly is very easy about 30 minutes to put everything. The instructions are very clear. The only thing I needed is a gaming cpu.. lol! Definitely a high quality and good standard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair was very easy and quick to assemble. The material feels nice and the cushion is firm. It’s too early to tell if the stitching is going to be durable but it looks like it might not. Overall it’s a good chair and looks very nice.

reviews.reviewText: We receive the first chair works goood, we decided to order another one for our office but the second one was ripped from top part of back Cushingalso one of the holes were bolt goes looked corroded and it was hard to installed bolt in it — see pictures can the supplier please contact me
